name: Internationale Pestalozzi Gesellschaft
goal:
The Association supports non-religious education organizations worldwide through project work, finances, logistics as well as consulting and professional education and training. The main focus is to make accessible basic education for children with the goal of supporting a peaceful, righteous and tolerant future for all mankind.

We want to help as much as possible that every child can get such basic education for a better and self-defined future as an adult in the country and region where its cultural roots lie.
